articles.title: IEA says clean energy progress remains 'far too slow'
articles.description: The shadow of the Paris Agreement looms large over the IEA's report.
articles.content:
The International Energy Agency issued a sobering warning Wednesday, claiming that clean energy progress remained "far too slow to put global emissions into sustained decline towards net zero."
The Paris-based organization made its remarks in an anno... [1650 chars]

articles.title: North Korea Says 'Squid Game' Reflects the South's 'Beastly' Society
articles.description: A North Korean propaganda website said "Squid Game" reflects how South Korea is where "corruption and immoral scoundrels are commonplace."
articles.content:
A North Korean propaganda website lauded "Squid Game" for showing how the South is where "corruption and immoral scoundrels are commonplace."
The publication added that the drama showed the "sad reality of the beastly South Korean society."
Last year... [2750 chars]

articles.title: Jon Gruden emails part of WFT owner Dan Snyder court filing
articles.description: A federal court filing four months ago revealed new e-mail correspondence of former Washington Football Team executive Bruce Allen that extended beyond Jon Gruden.
articles.content: Several inflammatory emails by Jon Gruden were filed as exhibits in federal court by attorneys for Washington Football Team owner Daniel Snyder in mid-June, almost four months before they were leaked to two newspapers and led to Gruden’s resignation ... [7114 chars]

articles.title: Netflix reinstates worker who spoke out against Dave Chappelle
articles.description: A Netflix worker who went viral for bashing the streaming service’s new Dave Chappelle special was reinstated on Tuesday.
articles.content:
A Netflix worker who went viral for bashing the streaming service’s new Dave Chappelle special was reinstated on Tuesday.
Terra Field, who is trans, had been suspended for allegedly attending a quarterly meeting for directors and vice presidents.

articles.title: U.S. to Open Canada and Mexico Borders for Vaccinated Travelers
articles.description: The opening of the land borders 19 months after they closed will reconnect the United States with its neighbors.
articles.content: WASHINGTON — The Biden administration will lift travel restrictions at the land borders with Canada and Mexico starting in November for fully vaccinated travelers, reopening the door of the United States to tourists and separated families that had be... [1297 chars]

articles.title: Astros Defeat White Sox 10-1 to Clinch ALDS
articles.description: Houston advances to its fifth consecutive ALCS, which is hard to write when all that banging is going on
articles.content: For the second straight game, the White Sox had their backs against the wall, as they needed a win to extend their season. On Sunday, the South Siders battled back after falling into an early 5-1 deficit. However, this time around, when going up 5-1 ... [5822 chars]

articles.title: Coroner reveals Gabby Petito was strangled by 'human force'
articles.description: Gabby Petito was strangled to death by “human force,” the Wyoming coroner who oversaw the Long Island native’s autopsy said on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Gabby Petito was strangled to death by “human force,” the Wyoming coroner who oversaw the Long Island native’s autopsy said on Tuesday.

articles.title: Three, including shooter, dead at Memphis Postal Service facility
articles.description: Two people were killed in a shooting at a Memphis Postal Service facility on Tuesday, and a third person identified as the shooter died from a self-inflicted gun wound.
articles.content:
Two people were killed in a shooting at a Memphis Postal Service facility on Tuesday, and a third person identified as the shooter died from a self-inflicted gun wound.
All three who died were U.S. Postal Service workers, and the shooter died from a ... [1184 chars]

articles.title: FDA authorizes first e-cigarette, cites benefit for smokers
articles.description: The FDA authorization applies to Vuse’s Solo e-cigarette and its tobacco-flavored nicotine cartridges which are manufactured by R.J. Reynolds.
articles.content:
The Food and Drug Administration on Tuesday for the first time authorized an electronic cigarette that the regulator says may help smokers cut back on traditional tobacco cigarettes.
The authorization applies to Vuse’s Solo e-cigarette and its tobacc... [1560 chars]
